channel.title: Management on Home
channel.description: Recent content in Management on Home

item.title: Leadership Essentials
item.description: I came across this amazing Udemy course by Chris Croft: “Leadership: Practical Leadership Skills”. I am not into a managerial role. But I wanted to have knowledge about the essentials of leadership. So I took up this course and I was very impressed by all the points which were put across during the course. Sharing some points which I had taken while pursuing the course. I hope you find it useful :)
